## BatchOperationsService.batchReAssignActivity() method

Reassignes a batch of activities. This operation returns an instance of 'BatchOperationCreationResult' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static batchReAssignActivity(requestModel: BatchReAssignActivityRequest): CancelablePromise<BatchOperationCreationResult>;
```
